column3: 2 dry-gently dry it with a tea towel
3 Slice-Slice one tomato into about 1/2 inch thick slices
4 Place-Place the thick slices of tomatoes on a platter, ensuring they only make a single layer
7 Season-Season platter with 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
8 Sprinkle-Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the tomato throughout the platter
6 Season-Season the tomato slices with salt
9 Add-Add a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, about 1 tablespoon, over the entire platter
